Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: Wildlife
Status: New Series
Network: BBC One ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Wednesdays at 08:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: December 19, 2012

Snow Babies is a wildlife documentary narrated by David Jason which follows a special group of baby animals born in some of the coldest and harshest places on the planet. 
(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-33653)
